about_the_game:
Yakuza: Like a Dragon Pachislot Machines add four Pachislot mini games to parlors around the city.

  • Pachislot: Million God: Return of the Gods
  • Pachislot: Beast King Oujya no Houkou
  • Pachislot: SOUTEN-NO-KEN PONYOU
  • Pachislot: ANOTHER GOD HADES -Zeus Dethroned

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood, Intense Violence,  Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Alcohol.
